content.question: The portrayal of Akhenaton and Nefertiti would have been viewed in its original cultural context as unconventional by its ancient Egyptian audience because it shows

choices.label: a royal couple depicted as rulers in the afterlife
an Egyptian queen alongside her husband, the pharaoh
the pharaoh and his family worshiping the gods
the pharaoh and his family in an affectionate scene

content.answer: the pharaoh and his family in an affectionate scene

topic.text: 2.3: Purpose and Audience in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
